name: Excommunication
description:
"You are on a quest to hunt down a knight who commit a sin of treachery, but as you dwell into the forest, his army awaits."

Control:

 W A S D to Walk

F to heal

Lmb to MeleeAttack

R to RangeAttack

V to Parry

Spacebar to Dash
